commits.message:
EUCA-6846

This fix takes care of the paste behavior exhibited in the video.
The problem is also present in the upstream source so we need to
submit this patch as a possible fix. I also adjusted the font size
of unsubmitted search text to match submitted search facet text
size.

The fundamental problem with delayed searches needs further (and
perhaps extensive) work. When a user performs a search, the javascript
walks the entire heirarchy of objects, performing the matching
operations on each child all the way down. Some searches do not
make any sense (ie. searching for text matches on IP addresses)
but which ones is something that requires thought.

Additionally, on a large search set the run time of the search is
going to run too long even if the search is simplified. The search
routine needs to be converted into a queue of operations that are
run in asynchronous batches so that it does not trigger the "your
script is running too slowly" error in the browser. This refactoring
shouldn't be difficult but is non-trivial.
